title: Can i please just get a RIOT answer to the question.
body:
Why isn't the mastery emote working? And is it an intentional removal or a bug?

Its such an awesome feature, please bring it back.

replies.body: and you dont need a Riot employee to answer your question.. Riot has little henchmen answering questions for them while they work on issues, such as the mastery emote not working.

[This is currently a known issue and is affecting all regions running patch 6.9.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lFOdTP88-cant-use-mastery-emote-ctrl5-ingame?comment=0004)

Riot is working on the issue and a fix should be released soon enough.
